author: A_Brickset_user
title: Not as bad as I thought...
review:
Galidor sets have started turning up in cheap shops (Pound$tretcher) in the UK for very low prices. This looked like the best of the bunch, so I bought it for a fiver. 

I have to say, it is not as bad as I thought it was going to be. They are not made by LEGO (made FOR LEGO in China, apparently) but they are still very high quality, and the packaging is also very high quality.

With this set, you can make a variety of red/dark red monsters; it comes with 2 heads, 6 feet, 4 long leg bits, 7 short leg/arm/neck parts, 4 arms and a variety of adominal pieces. 

It should make a formidable attaker of my Moonbase!
